name: Diamonds are for the Boys!
description:
How to Play:

Press A to control Hacker

 

Press D to control Cleaner

  

When both are pressed, they will pull the Thief up.

If neither are pressed, the Thief will be lowered down.

When not interacting with the rope machine, the Hacker can use the Laptop to lower the Alert level, as well as disable Security Camera.

When not interacting with the rope machine, the Cleaner fights off Security Guards.

Objective:

Get the Diamond at the bottom of the building and bring it back up to the top to win!

Source code:

https://github.com/BlackOpsBen/JoinedTogether
